Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:ASTMManagerSchemaContents@Ensemble ASTM Schema Contents") Write !,"
" Write ! #Include EnsEDIASTM If ((category'="") && (element'="")) { set name=$case(element, "DS":"Document Structure / DocType", "SS":"Segment Structure", "CS":"Component Structure", "CT":"Code Table", :"Unknown Structure") set caption=name_"s" set csppage="ASTMSchema"_$tr($P(name,"/")," ") &html<
ASTM #(caption)# in Category '#(category)#'#($S(""=base:"",1:" (base category '"_base_"')"))# are displayed below:
> Set max=0 Set next=$o($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,element,"")) Set n1st=$ZCVT($E(next),"U") write ""_$C(13,10)_ "
"_$S(+next=next:"Num",1:n1st)_""_$C(13,10) For cnt=1:1 { Set item=next,i1st=n1st Quit:item="" Set next=$o($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,element,item)), n1st=$ZCVT($E(next),"U") if cnt=1 write "" set:cnt>max max=cnt set tDesc=..EscapeHTML(##class(EnsLib.EDI.ASTM.Schema).GetDescription(element_":"_category_":"_item)) write ""_$C(13,10) if i1st'=n1st&&'((+item=item)&&(+next=next)) { While cnt#max { write "" set cnt=cnt+1 } set max=0,cnt=0 write "
" write item," 
 
"_$S(+next=next:"Num",1:n1st)_"" } Elseif cnt#10=0 { set cnt=0 write ""_$C(13,10) } } for { if cnt#10=1 quit write "" if cnt#10=0 quit set cnt=cnt+1 } } Write !,!,"
 
",! Write !,"

",! Write "

" Write !,"" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "
" Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble ASTM Schema Contents</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,! #Include EnsEDIASTM set category=%request.Get("CATEGORY") Set:""=category category=0 set element=%request.Get("ELEMENT") set base=$get($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"base")) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
